attributes.action: To pressure USA to NOT make another TV series of Heroes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Having just finished watching the first season of HEROES I believe the UK government should now petition the US to STOP the production of another season. I have lost 23 hours that I will NEVER get back.

Help our voices to be heard

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
